q: Museum, which houses thousands of ancient artifacts, was being protected by the army. Head of Antiquities, Zahi Hawass said on state television that it was not known if anything was stolen from the museum. There needs to be tighter security around the museum and fire trucks on standby. The museum can be set ablaze. This would be a disaster, Zahi Hawass warned.Firefighters were trying to extinguish the blaze at the headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party.

"It's tough for a House member to run for president," this strategist continues, and it looks like he will waltz into the governorship of Indiana. He must be thinking, "I've got time, and it's a lot easier to run as the governor of Indiana than as a House member from anywhere.' The source close to Mike Pence agrees. As governor, he"ll be able "to build a larger following and donor base" and address "the punditry that says you need executive experience."

Allen Iverson will get an anti-inflammatory shot today in order to reduce swelling in his right calf as he tries to avoid surgery and return his Turkish League team in time for the playoffs. At this point it is certainly more important to get( Allen Iverson 's) calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain, Andrews wrote. The filing says Eric Schmidt is selling the stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity. Eric Schmidt has sold Google stock before, notably after the company's initial public offering in 2004 when he sold shares worth roughly$ 258 million. a recent suggestion he could be a frontrunner. emerged as a possible candidate last month with reports that he could join Simon Cowell 's new Fox competition this year. Speaking to Digital Spy, he said: I've met people within the X Factor USA circle but you can't really talk about these things because if they don't come[ to anything] you end up looking like a bit of a d** k! "It's one of the biggest- probably the biggest- jobs in presenting at the moment... Of course I would love to do it, I'm a big X Factor fan, but I haven't confirmed anything.
